metadata.name: Bunker C Fuel Oil
alternate_names: Fuel Oil No.6, Residual/Heavy Fuel Oil; Mazout no 6, Mazout lourd/résiduel

reference.reference: Suntio, I., W.Y. Shiu, and D. Mackay, Analyses of Water Soluble Fractions of Crude Oils and Refined Products: A Study of Solubility of Selected Oils in Water, Environment Canada, Ottawa, Ontario, 1986
